text.section: Each incorporating political subdivision shall include in the law that creates an authority the articles of incorporation for the authority.
The officers of each incorporating political subdivision shall sign, acknowledge, and file the articles of incorporation for record with the State Department of Assessments and Taxation.

section.section:
The State Department of Assessments and Taxation shall:
Receive the articles of incorporation;
Mark the date and time of receipt to the articles; and
Issue a certificate of approval for any articles that comply with this subtitle.
